name: EMP Projector, Heavy, Experimental (XHEmpPj-8)
description: Experimental version of the heavy EMP projector. The EMP projector fires a directed electromagnetic pulse which fries electronic circuits and Ablinds sophonts who have Awareness.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
